text: Need River Murphy for Pizza Hut campaign. Budget around $2,359, looking for 3 x 10-minute unboxing, 2 x 30-second Instagram reel, 2 x Instagram story, 3 x 15-second TikTok. 12 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs December 2025. Usage rights for 8 months. Engagement period: 3 months. Need to sort out: TBC on final dates
